items.translated_title: NASA astronauts can now bring their phones with them on their mission to the moon
items.content: Get ready for some selfies that are out of this world. Crew-12 is expected to head to the International Space Station next week, while the highly anticipated Artemis II mission -- which will bring humans around the moon for the first time since the 1960s -- was delayed until March.
